overview: Brandon leads Enspire’s technology development and information technology efforts. His background combines a unique blend of business, technology, and legal experience. In 2001, Brandon founded Internal Machine Industries, Inc. where he also served as President and CEO. He has also worked for Motive, Inc. as a product manager. As an attorney, Brandon represented high-tech and emerging-growth companies. Brandon has an A.B. in Computer Science and English Literature from Dartmouth College. He also has a Masters in Electronics Engineering, a Masters of Business Administration, and a Juris Doctor from the University of Texas at Austin.
